N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2811.4 - One-third match

State Regulations
(a) In
negotiating each contract, the applicant must demonstrate its access to
matching support, available or anticipated to be made available, equal to at
least one-third of the amount of such contract. (b) The required match may be cash and/or
in-kind contributions and must be used for housing preservation and community
renewal activities. (c) In-kind
contributions must be verifiable, quantifiable, reasonable and relevant to the
company's activities. (1)

In-kind services
may not include: (i) routine board functions
and responsibilities; but may include, with division approval, services from
board members for which the company ordinarily would have to pay; (ii)
overtime by executive and full-time
administrative staff paid with rural preservation funds; (iii)
technical assistance provided by
division staff; or
(iv)
any other
category determined by the division. (d) Documentation of in-kind services must be
available for review by division staff. Notes
